scripts.test: yarn docker:up && yarn cypress:open && yarn docker:down
scripts.test:dev: yarn workspace @tumi/server docker:up && yarn open-tests:dev && yarn workspace @tumi/server docker:down
scripts.test:docker: yarn docker:up --build && yarn cypress:open --e2e && yarn docker:down
scripts.open-tests:dev: concurrently --names 'SERVER,ANGULAR,CYPRESS' -k -c 'auto' "yarn server"  "yarn legacy-app" "yarn workspace @tumi/server prisma:reset-dev ; yarn cypress:open --e2e --config baseUrl=http://localhost:4200 --env dev=true"
scripts.build:all: yarn workspace @tumi/server build:production && yarn workspace @tumi/legacy-app build
scripts.version: conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s && git add CHANGELOG.md
